reviews.review_msg: Most of time I don't know what she and the TAs want from us.

As a person who took this course as an elective, the amount of homework is not worth it. If you want to take this course, be prepared to do a lot of work. Also the marking for this course is strict as well(which means you get a low mark even though you devote so much effort into this mediocre course). The chosen movies are pretty boring too.

This professor doesn't know about film study at all. She just teaches something that you can find by on Google, and just have students in class speaking, and never gives something her own. Feedbacks are unclear, sometimes not given.
